MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 area of Dunfermline. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:50am. Our engineers are currently onsite near the Littlewoods substation investigating the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:48am on Sunday, 06 December 2020
